item.title: 英国房价意外连续第二个月下跌
item.description: 英国吉尔福德的住宅。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Homes in Guildford, UK. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织批准向马里提供 1.2 亿美元紧急融资支持
item.description: 马里与国际货币基金组织达成了 1.2 亿美元紧急融资的工作人员级别协议。【原文：Mali reached a staff level agreement with the International Monetary Fund for $120 million of emergency financing.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: Setser 说：巨大的外汇收益是日本从干预中获得的好处
item.description: 美国外交关系委员会高级研究员布拉德-塞泽尔（Brad Setser）认为，如果日本政府官员周一确实通过卖出美元、买入日元的方式干预了货币市场，那么日本政府有望获得 "意外 "利润。【原文：The Japanese government can expect to have realized “windfall” profits if officials did indeed intervene in currency markets by selling dollars and buying yen on Monday, according to Brad Setser, a senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations.】

item.title: 戈德瑞集团拆分集团以维护家庭 "和谐
item.description: 控制着消费品、金融服务和房地产等业务的印度戈德里杰家族宣布，将拆分这家拥有 125 年历史的企业集团，以 "保持和谐，更好地协调所有权"。【原文：India’s Godrej family, which controls businesses spanning consumer goods, financial services and real estate, has announced it will split the 125-year-old conglomerate to “maintain harmony and better align ownership.”】

item.title: 美联储还不会下台。其他人等不及了
item.description:
我们的 "危险下降年 "系列报道显示，大型央行无法永远等待美国开始降息— ，但仍担心会先下手为强。【原文：

Our series on The Year of Descending Dangerously shows big central banks can’t hang on forever for the US to start cutting rates — but still fear going first.

】

item.title: 美元主导地位解析
item.description:
该货币规模庞大、稳定，在全球经济中根深蒂固，这也是它成为引人注目的目标的原因。【原文：

The currency is big, stable and entrenched in the global economy — which is also why it’s become a compelling target.

】

item.title: 加息风险攀升，新兴市场债券押注泡汤
item.description: 随着一些新兴市场央行面临加息压力，而不是像几周前普遍预期的那样降息，全球投资者正在解除对本币债券的押注。【原文：Global investors are unwinding bets on local-currency bonds as some emerging-market central banks come under pressure to raise interest rates — rather than cut them as widely anticipated just weeks ago.】

item.title: 巴菲特青睐的三井物产宣布回购股票和股票分割
item.description: 巴菲特青睐的日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：Warren Buffett-favored Japanese trading firm Mitsui & Co. announced that it will buy back up to 200 billion yen ($1.3 billion) worth of shares, as it looks to boost investor returns.】

item.title: 市场为美联储会议的鹰派基调做好准备，黄金保持跌势
item.description: 由于火热的美国经济数据进一步削弱了美联储迅速转向宽松货币政策的希望，黄金维持了上一交易日的大幅跌势。【原文：Gold held its hefty decline in the previous session, as hot US economic data further dented hopes the Federal Reserve will rapidly pivot to monetary easing.】

item.title: 中国股市迎来一年来最长外资买入潮
item.description: 外国基金连续第三个月增持中国股票，预计劳动节假期后中央政治局会议的积极政策基调将提振市场情绪。【原文：Foreign funds boosted holdings of Chinese shares for the third straight month, with positive policy tone from the Politburo meeting expected to bolster sentiment after the Labor Day holiday.】

item.title: 中东停火前景和美国通胀引发石油持续下跌
item.description: 由于中东停火有望缓解紧张局势，以及在美联储会议召开前，通胀上升的迹象对美国需求前景构成压力，石油延续跌势。【原文：Oil extended a decline on the prospect a cease-fire in the Middle East will ease tensions and as signs of elevated inflation weigh on the outlook for US demand ahead of a Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: 品尼高公司发展迅速，鲁特将加入新的联营公司
item.description: Pinnacle 投资管理集团将成立一家新的附属公司，在这家澳大利亚公司的下一步国际扩张中，包括 Peter Rutter 在内的前皇家伦敦资产管理公司全球股票团队成员将加入该公司。【原文：Pinnacle Investment Management Group will create a new affiliate that will house former members of Royal London Asset Management’s global equities team, including Peter Rutter, in the next leg of the Australian firm’s international expansion.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好赵长鹏被判入狱四个月交易员等待美联储利率决议。亚马逊云计算销售提振盈利。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Changpeng Zhao gets four months in prison. Traders await Fed rate decision. Amazon cloud sales boost earnings. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 摩根大通 ETF 解决方案全球主管布莱恩-莱克离职
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司 ETF 解决方案全球主管 Bryon Lake 即将离职。【原文：Bryon Lake, JPMorgan Asset Management’s global head of ETF solutions, is departing the firm.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因重燃的利率担忧而下滑：市场综述
item.description: 由于市场再次担忧美联储将在更长时间内维持更高利率，这助长了美国基准股票的抛售，并推高了债券收益率和美元，亚洲股市将在五月份开始时走低。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to start May lower after renewed concerns that the Federal Reserve will keep interest rates higher for longer helped fuel a sell-off in US benchmarks and boosted bond yields and the dollar.】

item.title: 邮轮公司维京号首次公开募股融资 15.4 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，维京控股有限公司（Viking Holdings Ltd.）的首次公开募股定价接近市场预期区间的上限，为这家豪华邮轮运营商和两位投资者筹集了 15.4 亿美元。【原文：Viking Holdings Ltd. priced its initial public offering near the top of a marketed range to raise $1.54 billion for the luxury cruise operator and two investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日元的剧烈波动只是未来的一个缩影
item.description:
除非深层次的结构性问题得到解决，否则剧烈波动可能会变得更加频繁。其影响远远超出日本。【原文：

Unless deep structural issues are resolved, violent swings may become more frequent. The implications stretch far beyond Japan.

】

item.title: 特鲁多耗资 250 亿美元的跨山项目获得最终批准，可以运送石油
item.description: 跨山输油管扩建工程获得了监管部门的最终许可，可以开始将原油从油砂运往加拿大太平洋沿岸，结束了这个备受争议的项目长达十年的等待。【原文：The expansion of the Trans Mountain pipeline received the final regulatory clearance it needs to start shipping crude from the oil sands to Canada’s Pacific Coast, concluding a decade-long wait for the controversial project.】

item.title: 道明银行在美国洗钱调查中承担 4.5 亿美元赔偿金
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）因美国监管机构和执法部门正在对其反洗钱行为进行调查，已初步拨备 4.5 亿美元，并表示预计还会有更多处罚。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank has taken an initial provision of $450 million in connection with ongoing US regulatory and law enforcement probes into its anti-money laundering practices, and said it expects additional penalties to come.】

item.title: 花旗银行称，交易员预计美联储日当天将出现 2023 年以来最大波动
item.description: 与近一年来的任何时候相比，期权市场对美联储周三的利率决定可能引发的 S&P 500 指数大幅波动更为担忧。【原文：The options market is more concerned about a potentially big move in the S&P 500 Index off of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision Wednesday than it’s been at any point in almost a year.】

item.title: 杰里米-亨特警告反对英国金融业监管局的 "点名羞辱 "计划
item.description: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）就英国金融监管机构在早期阶段点名调查公司的计划发出警告，这是对英国最高金融监管机构罕见的政治干预。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt has warned the UK’s financial watchdog over its plans to name firms it’s investigating at an early stage, a rare political intervention against Britain’s top finance regulator.】

item.title: PG&E 正与 KKR 商谈出售电力业务少数股权事宜
item.description: PG&E Corp.表示，该公司正在洽谈将其发电业务的少数股权出售给投资公司 KKR & Co.【原文：PG&E Corp. said it’s in talks to sell a minority stake in its power generation business to investment firm KKR & Co. in a transaction that regulators have signaled they don’t intend to support.】

item.title: 债券市场极端空头押注鲍威尔鹰派中枢
item.description: 在许多人预计美联储将采取鹰派立场之前，债券交易员们越来越看跌近期市场的下跌。【原文：Bond traders who’ve been stung by the market’s recent rout are turning more and more bearish ahead of what many expect will be a hawkish tilt by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 波多黎各公用事业债券持有人寻求更多破产赔付
item.description: 波多黎各破产电力公司的债券持有人正在推动法院增加他们可以收回的金额，因为新的预测显示，由于用电量增加，该公司的收入可能会超出预期。【原文：Bondholders of Puerto Rico’s bankrupt power utility are pushing for the court to increase what they stand to recover as new projections show the company’s revenue is likely to outstrip expectations due to higher electricity consumption.】

item.title: 物流公司 WWEX Group 为潜在 IPO 寻找承销商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，第三方物流供应商 WWEX 集团在可能进行的美国首次公开募股之前，已经选定了承销商。【原文：WWEX Group, a third-party logistics provider, tapped underwriters ahead of a potential US initial public offering, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 佛罗里达高铁债券在 "缺乏 "高收益债券的市场上大受欢迎
item.description: 由于投资者对新的高收益证券趋之若鹜，上周为佛罗里达州私营铁路运营商 Brightline 发行的市政债券在二级市场攀升。【原文：Municipal bonds issued last week for Florida’s private rail operator, Brightline, climbed in the secondary market as investors clamored for new high-yield securities.】

item.title: 私募股权投资在美国首次公开募股市场复苏中缺席严重
item.description: 虽然公司创始人和风险投资者从上市市场近期的反弹中获得了收益，但私募股权基金却几乎没有从中受益。【原文：While company founders and venture investors have been reaping gains from the listings market’s recent rebound, private equity has hardly benefited.】

item.title: 鸡指连锁餐厅 Zaxby's 将在债券市场借款
item.description: 以鸡翅和鸡柳闻名的连锁餐厅 Zaxby's 计划通过出售资产支持债券来借款 2.85 亿美元，这是自 2021 年以来的第二次此类交易。【原文：Zaxby’s, a restaurant chain known for its chicken wings and fingers, plans to borrow $285 million by selling asset-backed bonds, its second such deal since 2021.】

item.title: 缉毒局正着手对大麻进行重新分类，大麻股因此大涨
item.description: 据美联社报道，美国缉毒署正着手将大麻重新归入危险性较低的毒品类别，这对大麻产业来说是一个历史性的转变。【原文：Shares of cannabis-related companies jumped Tuesday after the AP reported that the US Drug Enforcement Administration is moving to reclassify marijuana to a less dangerous drug category in a historic shift for the industry.】
